creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure in hooded garment, seated in 3/4 profile against a stone at L, head bent over a large book resting on his knees
inscription:
Inscription

in graphite below platemark at bottom center: Probedruck (\"proof impression\")
provenance: [Galerie Gerda Bassenge, Berlin, sold to Bergquist]; [James A. Bergquist, Newton Centre, Mass.; sold October 1, 1990, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Seated Monk Reading
